html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13262024-12-16ECCC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Declaring that the Regulations Respecting Reduction in the Release of Methane and Certain Volatile Organic Compounds (Upstream Oil and Gas Sector) Do Not Apply in Saskatchewan, 2025
PrecisOrder declaring that the REGULATIONS RESPECTING REDUCTION IN THE RELEASE OF METHANE AND CERTAIN VOLATILE ORGANIC COMPOUNDS (UPSTREAM OIL AND GAS SECTOR) DO NOT APPLY IN SASKATCHEWAN, 2025 in order to suspend the application of the Federal Regulations in Saskatchewan, effective December 31, 2029, or sooner if the underlying equivalency agreement terminates or is terminated.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0270 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order declaring that the REGULATIONS RESPECTING REDUCTION IN THE RELEASE OF METHANE AND CERTAIN VOLATILE ORGANIC COMPOUNDS (UPSTREAM OIL AND GAS SECTOR) DO NOT APPLY IN SASKATCHEWAN, 2025 in order to suspend the application of the Federal Regulations in Saskatchewan, effective December 31, 2029, or sooner if the underlying equivalency agreement terminates or is terminated.
